testcase.name: Verifying user enter flipkart website using Chrome Browser
testcase.system-out: Given User is on flipkart page using "Chrome" browser.......................passed Then User should verify success message "Online Shopping Site for Mobiles"..passed

testcase.name: Verifying user enter flipkart website using Edge Browser
testcase.system-out: Given User is on flipkart page using "Edge" browser.........................passed Then User should verify success message "Online Shopping Site for Mobiles"..passed

testcase.classname: Search and Add to Card Module
testcase.name: Verifying search and add to card
testcase.system-out: Given User is on flipkart page using "Chrome" browser.......................passed Then User should verify success message "Online Shopping Site for Mobiles"..passed When User search "laptop" in search box and press enter.....................passed When User click on one search result........................................passed And User Add selected laptop to cart........................................passed

testcase.name: Verifying proceed to Checkout
testcase.system-out: Given User is on flipkart page using "Chrome" browser.......................passed Then User should verify success message "Online Shopping Site for Mobiles"..passed When User search "laptop" in search box and press enter.....................passed When User click on one search result........................................passed And User Add selected laptop to cart........................................passed When User navigate to Add to cart...........................................passed Then User should verify correct item in the cart............................passed When User click on the Proceed to Checkout button...........................passed
